    • Method Detail

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Unregisters this menu, all the elements, and closes the menu for all viewers.

      • unregister

        public void unregister()
        Unregister this menu.
        An unregistered menu cannot be interacted with by a player. If you attempt to build this menu with elements that don't support unregistered menus, you will get an IllegalStateException.
        Be sure to unregister all menus once you're done with them!
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this menu is not registered.

      • setAutoUnregister

        public void setAutoUnregister(boolean autoUnregister)
        Parameters:
        autoUnregister - true if this menu should automatically be unregistered after all players close it.
